title: Ed's Buffalo Wings and Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of the first places in Philly to offers fully vegan pizza options in addition to its regular (non-veg) menu. Vegan pizzas are created with handmade sauce on eggless dough and topped with Daiya brand vegan cheese; available in whole pies as well as slices. Call ahead for the day's slice options.
